title: Jonathan Barnbrook
content:
**[Indices](http://web.archive.org/web/20140822232922/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Indices): [Designers](http://web.archive.org/web/20140822232922/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Designers): Jonathan Barnbrook**

**Jonathan Barnbrook** (b. 1966) is a British graphic designer, type designer and typographer. He studied graphic design at [Central Saint Martins College of Art and Design](http://web.archive.org/web/20140822232922/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Central%20Saint%20Martins%20College%20of%20Art%20and%20Design) and the [Royal College of Art](http://web.archive.org/web/20140822232922/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Royal%20College%20of%20Art) from 1985-1992, before starting his career as an independent graphic designer. Formerly of [Emigre](http://web.archive.org/web/20140822232922/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Emigre), he now runs his own independent foundry [Virus](http://web.archive.org/web/20140822232922/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Virus) in London. Work includes the Roppongi Hills logo and collaborations with British artist Damien Hirst. Emigre fonts include [Exocet](http://web.archive.org/web/20140822232922/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Exocet) and [Mason](http://web.archive.org/web/20140822232922/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Mason).

Barnbrook: [http://www.barnbrook.net/](http://web.archive.org/web/20140822232922/http:/www.barnbrook.net/)  
Virus: [http://www.virusfonts.com/](http://web.archive.org/web/20140822232922/http:/www.virusfonts.com/)
author: higashi
